summary: A self-proclaimed Russian prince, a Mexican bandit and a radical Irish female journalist team up during the Mexican Revolution to find fortune and notoriety.
cast: Franco Nero|Eli Wallach|Lynn Redgrave|Horst Janson|Eduardo Fajardo|José Moreno|Víctor Israel|Gisela Hahn|José Jaspe|Enrique Espinosa|Gunda Hiller|Furio Meniconi|Dan van Husen|Rudy Gaebel|Carla Mancini|Mirko Ellis|Marilù Tolo|Rafael Albaicín|Angelo Boscariol|Tito García|Luigi Antonio Guerra|Lorenzo Robledo|Vicente Roca|Carlos Romero Marchent
title: ¡Viva la muerte... tuya!
